summons.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an official order to appear in a court of law
summons.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The judge must issue a summons.
He had been accused of a drug offence but police had been unable to serve a summons on him  (=officially order him to appear in court).
summons.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to order someone to appear in a court of law
summons.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: She has been summonsed to appear in court.
Basil was summonsed for wounding a police officer.
summons.translation[2].definitions[0].de: an official order to appear in a court of law
summons.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Administrators of his estate have issued a summons to get him to return to Australia.
summons.translation[3].definitions[0].de: to officially order someone to appear in a court of law
summons.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: I was summonsed to appear as a witness.
